name: Space War (itch) (Singularity)
description:
WATCH OUT! 

Space is in the middle of a war due to... well, there is never really a good reason for a war, all you need to know is that there are enemies to be destroyed. Get higher and higher scores to unlock more powerful ships and go further in this infinite war.

CREDITS

Base Art And Main Assets: https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment

Background And Other UI Assets: 

  • https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
  • https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator
  • https://pablogamedev.itch.io/free-icons

SFX Effects: https://void1gaming.itch.io/halftone-sound-effects-pack-lite
